author: Shinkai

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: ElevenLabs API key for text-to-speech conversion. Required for authentication

voice.description: Voice ID or name (e.g., 'Aria', 'Roger'). Default: first available voice

description: Converts text to speech using Eleven Labs API and saves the audio as an MP3 file.
name: Eleven Labs Text-to-Speech

fileName.description: Custom name for output MP3 file. If omitted, generates from text content

text.description: Input text to synthesize into speech. Must not be empty

audio_file.description: Path to generated MP3 file containing synthesized speech

characters_remaining.description: Remaining character quota in ElevenLabs API after this request

characters_used.description: Characters consumed from ElevenLabs API quota for this request
